info.name: Phog.net for Chrome v11
info.description:
v11
Vanity Icons added
minor changes to coloring of words
Changed more backgrounds
Added Sans-Serif Font
Added more coloring/shading
changed backgrounds to levels of gray
Increased size of Avatars (credit Inside Carolina)
Added Font Coloring to Red
Added Shading for Every-other message
Took out CarolinaBlue Ballons
